Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, RealKerbal3x said:
> 
> 
> /run program
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/) deletion in progress
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [print] RealKerbal3x's hill
> 

Is this python? If so it would just be a syntax error. 

(print) realkerbal3xshill

would just say the words realkerbal3xhill.

Parenthesis, not brackets.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-27T18:15:23Z" title="07/27/2018 06:15  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 27, 2018</time> by Kernel Kraken**

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, Kernel Kraken said:
> 
> 
> Is this python? If so it would just be a syntax error. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> (print) realkerbal3xshill
> 
> 
> 
> 
> would just say the words realkerbal3xhill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Parenthesis, not brackets.
> 

I don't actually do coding, so I really am making it up ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
MY HILL
I take the hill. My hill.
I crash minmus into you. My hill.

Kill <sub><s>B</s></sub>hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-28T04:32:01Z" title="07/28/2018 04:32  AM" data-short="5 yr">July 28, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
I am immune to all things. My hill.
Umbrella Corp kidnaps you and holds in a dungeon as a highly immune object for experiments.
I teleport out. My hill!

I give up.

[@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill.

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">Neutral territory.</font>
Since [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/) has not established a military presence there, I take the hill easily. My hill.
I happily become a subject of [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) and always make sure sandwiches are given to him with mustard.

It doesn't make sense, you will just pointlessly spend mustard.  

After visiting the Umbrella dungeons he can't feel a hot taste, but uncontrollably snots if sees orange color.

Though it's not ~~a~~ your problem, as Aperture Science detected his teleportation and kidnapped him in turn.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-28T15:14:10Z" title="07/28/2018 03:14  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 28, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I use a rod from the gods to take back my hill from [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/), destroying it in the process. I also build an indestructible, non-portalable bunker in the crater, as well as negotiating with the Krakens so they will protect it.

My crater.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-28T15:50:45Z" title="07/28/2018 03:50  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 28, 2018</time> by TeslaPenguin1**

You offended the gods whose are rods.

A crater full of melted glass after a lightning hit.
My crater full of melted glass.
I fill in the crater. My hill.
I burn down the hill. My.. um... <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">barbecued hill.</font>

I put barbecue sauce on [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)‘s barbecued hill, drowning him in tasty goodness in the process of making it taste better.

My tasty hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-29T01:29:54Z" title="07/29/2018 01:29  AM" data-short="5 yr">July 29, 2018</time> by TeslaPenguin1**
I don't like barbecue. My hill.

The barbecue gods destroy you for not liking barbecue.  Then they give it back to me.

My barbecue-flavored hill.

Barbarians came and took the barbecue. Their hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-29T04:31:16Z" title="07/29/2018 04:31  AM" data-short="5 yr">July 29, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

/kill barbarians

Minecraft commands! Deal with it! My hill.

/kill RealKerbal3x

My hill.

/kill HansonKerman

My hill.
